extension.description: Please visit www.tvaddons.ag for addon support and information! [CR][CR]Navi-X is the oldest and most trusted add-on for Kodi, used by millions of people worldwide. [CR]You'll find everything from live television to your favourite movies and television shows, easily accessible.
extension.news: v4.0.1 (3-10-2017) - updated code to work with Kodi 17 - updated resolutions to work with Kodi 17 default skin - changed to only have Navi-X availible from programs menu because of restrictions of the new Kodi 17 default skin - fixed list view and menu alignments for 1080i - brought back updated status in list views for all lists and resolutions - more work on thumbnail view to get it to operate correctly - made view changes save in settings now that thumbnailview seems operational - added show and list description to context menu so they are available in all views
